casebody.data:
FARM BUREAU
v.
ARMWOOD, et al. No. 99A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2007. R. Michael Strickland, Glenn C. Raynor, Raleigh, for N.C. Farm Bureau. Frank A. Cassiano, Jr., Greenville, John Bramble, Charles David Creech, New Bern, for Armwood, et al. James W. Bryan, Daniel W. Koenig, Greensboro, for Trucking Industry Defense Asso. David L. Brown, Greensboro, for Asso. of Defense Attorneys. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of April 2007 by N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief: "Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of April 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
